text: aye imaan waalo! tum Allah taâ€™ala ke madadgaar ban jaao, jis tarah hazrath Maryam ke bete hazrath Isa(alaihissalaam) ne hawariyo se farmaya ke kaun hai jo Allah ki raah mein mera madadgaar bane? hawariyo ne kaha hum Allah ki raah mein madad gaar hai, pas bani israel mein se ek jamaath to imaan laayi aur ek jamaath ne kufr kiya, to hum ne momino ki un ke dushmano ke muqaable mein madad ki, pas wo ghaalib aa gaye
